title: Vintage 2 bedroom
posting_body: Unique unit in vintage building in a great location.
Building is on a quiet side street in a nice neighborhood and only 1 block from Uptown Park Ridge.
Withing 5 minutes you can walk to the Metra Station, Whole Foods, Pickwick movie theater, Starbucks, numerous other shops and 10 + restaurants & bars.
This is a spacious unit with 2 bedrooms, a large living room, large eat in kitchen and one bathroom.
There is great storage in this unit with a mud room, a large walk in pantry and other cabinets.
The lease period will be for one year and the rent is $1,350 per month plus 2 months security deposit.
Application fee is $25 for a credit check (targeting credit scores > 650).
Rent includes all utilities and there is free laundry in the building.
No pets allowed and no smokers.
Parking is on the street, which requires a permit which you can get from city hall.
Please call Sean at 847-372-4789 for questions or to see.
